meanings.definition: Tougheners: substances added to a material to make it stronger or more resilient
meanings.sent1: The tougheners in the paint helped protect the walls from scratches.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic added tougheners to the metal to prevent it from bending easily.
meanings.sent3: The tougheners in the glue made it so strong that even a superhero couldn't break it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like tougheners, strengthening her resolve with each challenge she faced.
meanings.sent5: The tougheners in the fabric made it feel like armor against the cold wind.

meanings.definition: Tougheners: people or things that make someone or something more resilient or determined
meanings.sent1: Her friends were like tougheners, always supporting her through tough times.
meanings.sent2: The coach acted as a toughener, pushing the team to never give up.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy was a toughener, always wagging its tail and bringing joy to everyone.
meanings.sent4: His words were like tougheners, motivating her to keep going even when things seemed impossible.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood as a toughener, weathering every storm and remaining strong.
